About the Gym:

Established in 2018 by active professional Muay Thai fighter Yeison "Yayyoo" Berdugo, Yayyoo Fitness Center MMA is a full-service fitness center and fight gym. At the gym Yayyoo personally teaches not just Muay Thai for adults but also for kids.

Boxing, Kickboxing, Calisthenics, and one-on-one custom personal training are also offered.

About Yayyoo:

Yeison D. Berdugo is a professional athlete and a professional Mixed Martial Arts (MMA)/ Muay Thai fighter. He first discovered his passion for health and fitness at the age of 15 while participating in High School soccer and track and field. During that high school career he competed All-State, All-Divisions, and All-Class; recieving multiple trophies and awards - incuding New England MVP. This success fueled his passion and drove him to persuing more athletic goals, which led him to Martial Arts.

He worked hard to achieve his goals. More often than not training three times a day - seven days a week. All of the work eventually paid off though as he developed a career as a fighter; eventually fighting for one of the largest Muay Thai promotions in the United States, Lion Fight Promotions. He is still an active fighter for Lion Fight currently.

Achieving his own goals against the odds inspired him to make helping others achieve their goals a personal mission. Through his gym and his platform as a fighter he frequently reaches out to the youth encouraging them to fight for success and not to let anything prevent them from chasing their dreams. He has even brought this message into schools, sharing his story and offering living proof that anything is possible through hard work, dedication, and perseverence. In the future he's looking forward to travelling and getting his message out to as many as possible.
